pageTitle: A77 purchasing strategy - risk mitigation against divorce: Sony Alpha SLR/SLT A-mount Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Just a bit of fun........but does anyone else have any unusual strategy ideas...... 4) Conveniently manage to damage (you could pretend) your existing camera body to the point of uneconomic repair.....so there is an urgent need for a replacement. 3) If you already have more than 6 camera bodies - just try and slip it into the camera bag without making a big issue of it and hope that she doesn't notice (risky this one) 2) Buy your wife an expensive piece of kit that she would like about a month previous to purchasing the A77........this
